name: (PREMIUM)SOULLESS - Visual Novel/Interactive Story
description:
Soulless - Visual novel/Interactive story and otome inspired game for Linux, Windows and Mac. 

Immerse yourself in action, drama and romance and make choices which will lead you to one of the 8 endings. 

Art and Story by Flairvee 

Made with Ren'Py 7.4.11 

Story

You live a simple life as a doctor in a simple town... Until a train ride at midnight leads you straight into the hands of a dangerous demon lord! In order to save your life you give away your soul and make a deal with him... thinking you might be able to get away... But even stranger and darker things await you as your fate gets entangled with that of the demons in the Dark World... 

Can you trust them? Can you save them? Can you love them? 

Soulless will be released in 3 phases: 

Soulless Ambience (Available Now, 4hrs Gameplay) - The introduction where you can bond with the characters, know the story and problems in the characters' lives. 

Soulless Ephemeral - The part where things seem to be happy, but you never know what's hiding deep within. 

Soulless Redemption - The final part of the story, where you will get to know the consequences of your actions and choices; and what effect it has had on the characters.

-- IMPORTANT --

This is the Premium Version of the game. It has complete artwork (CGs) and complete access to Premium/Special Choices. In order to enjoy the game to it's fullest and gain access to ALL Premium choices and unlock all artworks in the gallery, grab the PREMIUM VERSION OF SOULLESS! 

A Basic (Not Demo) Version of this game is available on the link below. 

SOULLESS - Visual Novel/Interactive Story

-- WARNING -- 

Mild to Moderate Horror Content, Mild to Moderate Jump-Scares, Mentioned death and disease. This game contains a few images that some may find disturbing, although horror is not the main part of the story.
